General.Name: Sambo Corrugated Board Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sambo Corrugated Board Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells corrugated cardboards and cardboard boxes in South Korea. It offers A flute, B flute, AB flute, C flute, E flute, EB flute, BB flute, CB flute, and CE flute corrugated cardboards; and corrugated cardboard boxes for use in industrial and agricultural products, and various die-cutting boxes. Sambo Corrugated Board Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Shiheung, South Korea.
